position.marginalia_text: (3) King Queen Laertes Priest Attendant Corpse Supported

substitution.copyText: ‘Twill not be seen in him there, there are men as mad as mad as he.
substitution.amendedText: ‘Twill not be seen in him; there there are men as mad as mad as he

substitution.copyText: Alas poor Yorick I knew him Horatio, a fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy he hath bore me on his back a thousand times and now how abhorred in my imagination it is? My gorge rifes at it.
substitution.amendedText: Alas poor Yorick! I knew him, Horatio, a fellow of infinite jest; of most excellent fancy: he hath bore me in his arms a thousand times:

substitution.copyText: to this favour she must come; make her laugh at that,
substitution.amendedText: to this favour she must come;

substitution.copyText: Dost thou think Alexander lookt on this fashion I’th’ earth?
substitution.amendedText: Dost thou think, Alexander lookt on this fashion I’th’ earth?

substitution.copyText: To what base use we may return Horatio! Why may not imagination trace the nobble dust of Alexander till he find it stopping a bung hole.
substitution.amendedText: To what base use we may return, Horatio! Why may not imagination trace the nobble dust of Alexander, till he find it stopping a bung hole.
